StringProperty.Name: OutputBaseName
StringProperty.Description: Specifies the default base name of all generated files. If unspecified, the base name is inferred from the input file name.

StringProperty.Name: EventmanPath
StringProperty.Description: Specifies the path to the event manifest schema (eventman.xsd).

BoolProperty.Name: GenerateResources
BoolProperty.Description: Specifies whether resources are generated. These include the ETW template, associated message tables and a resource include file.

StringProperty.Name: MessageTableFile
StringProperty.Description: Specifies the path for generated message table files. The culture of the contained messages is automatically added to the file name.

StringProperty.Name: EventTemplateFile
StringProperty.Description: Specifies the path to the generated ETW binary template.

StringProperty.Name: ResourceFile
StringProperty.Description: Specifies the path to the generated resource include file.

BoolProperty.Name: GenerateCode
BoolProperty.Description: Specifies whether logging code is generated.

StringProperty.Name: HeaderFile
StringProperty.Description: Specifies the path to the generated header file.

StringProperty.Name: CodeGenerator
StringProperty.Description: Which code generator should be used (e.g. 'cxx', 'mc').

StringProperty.Name: LogNamespace
StringProperty.Description: Namespace where generated code is placed. Use '.' as separator (e.g. Company.Product.Tracing).

StringProperty.Name: EtwNamespace
StringProperty.Description: Namespace where common ETW code is placed. Use '.' as separator (e.g. Company.Product.ETW).

BoolProperty.Name: UseCustomEnabledChecks
BoolProperty.Description: Specifies whether custom checks are used to check if events are enabled.

BoolProperty.Name: SkipDefines
BoolProperty.Description: Skip code definitions for non-essential resources.

StringProperty.Name: AlwaysInlineAttribute
StringProperty.Description: String used to mark always-inline functions, usually a macro name (e.g. FOO_ALWAYS_INLINE).

StringProperty.Name: NoinlineAttribute
StringProperty.Description: String used to mark noinline functions, usually a macro name (e.g. FOO_NOINLINE).
